name: Ronald Butt
text: Good prices for the pizza. Can park in parking lot nearby. Staff is friendly. Plenty of specials to choose from. Problem in the past with opening late seems to be fixed with new management. Easily spotted from the street near Foodtown and near train station. Staff seems a little sparse. They do deliver in the neighborhood.

name: chimere O
text: Food is right. Clean store. Observes sanitary laws and employees are nice

name: The Handyman Let's have fun
text: Not bad. Had to wait 15 min for pizza. Thought little ceasars suppose to be ready

text: I went to Little Caesars on Prospect Avenue Mount Vernon New York service was great pizza with excellent

name: Lilramo Gillead
text: Horrible service. I understand if pizzas are suppose to be ready, why is there a 20 minute wait!? Especially with 5 people working behind the counter!

name: Laura Hamilton
text:
The service was horrible. I waited 30 minutes for my order because the cashier was giving the same pizzas to his friends who came in after me. Only after complaining for several minutes did I get my regular pizza and thin crust pizza
I will NEVER go into any little Caesar's again
